content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(-18, -49)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18, -49) and a furnace at position (-18, -49).

### Copper cable factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position (-18, -49) to the assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5).

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of lab (position -17.5, 23.5).

### Pipe groups
Multiple pipe groups are present, facilitating fluid transport across various positions.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using assembling machine without required resources
- Ensure that the assembling machine has all necessary ingredients (copper-plate and iron-gear-wheel) before setting the recipe to produce automation science packs.

### Errors when placing entities without power
- Check that the electricity generator is properly connected to the power network before attempting to use the steam engine or any other electrical entities.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
